attributes.action: Removal of Kindom Security Environmental Enforcement on behalf of Denbighshire County Council from Rhyl & Prestatyn
attributes.additional_details: We the People of Denbighshire demand that Denbighshire County Council remove the Kingdom Security officers acting as behalf of D.C.C as Environmental Enforcement from the streets of of our fine county. They have handed out Fines to many members of the public without proof or evidence of any criminal act as well as hounding, stalking and using entrapment tactics on vulnerable people who will not stand up for there rights and fear of legal repercussions and costs...
